content:
Posted: March 3, 2016
Early Access Review
								Keeping an eye on this game all the way back from when it first appeared on Greenlight, Crazy Pixel Streaker is a pretty good entry in Steam Early Access. The developers put everything in there that they promised they would do so far. A working online mode, small character customizations with hats that you get from bosses and give you different bonuses, The Party Mode with a cute minigame that is kind of like Rocket League.All of this however, is just a framework. CPS has the potential of having so much more stuff in it. More stadiums, more crazy weapons and character customization, more mini games that have party game potential....Now the important question: Would I recommend you to buy it at this early stage?I would say yes!It is already super fun to beat the living hell out of everything that tries to stop you in your mission to streak around and it gets even better with a couple of friends (and probably a beer or two :D).Don't let yourself get fooled though! Despite of its more "cute" retro graphics style this game is extremely challenging and whether you play alone or team up with your friends, you're going to find yourself thinking about a plan and some tactics to survive long enough to finally go into the bossfight, without having every item used already and dying within the next hit.For now CPS will probably give you around 15-20h of fun before you did and see everything.I'm going to keep this review updated when the development advances.

Early Access Review
Arcade Shooter / Beat 'em Up Arena


YouTube™ Video: [Early Access] Crazy Pixel Streaker || Arcade Shooter / Beat 'em Up Arena 

			Views: 386		

			#crazypixelstreaker http://store.steampowered.com/app/393460/ Add me on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/desolater_iv/ + The gameplay is fun and silly, and consists of running around beating...		

+ The gameplay is fun and silly, and consists of running around beating everyone on the field up or shooting everyone on the field and causing a ton of chaos+ Lots of weapon pick-ups / power ups+ Challenging Bosses+ Great soundtrack+ Random events making for a different experience each time you play+ Up to 4-player co-op / Local or Online+ Pretty amusing concept to see streakers cause so much chaosThis game is in Early Access so don't take these too seriously- Very RNG based, if you don't have enough power ups / weapons you won't be able to beat any of the bosses, and you can die very easily if you get unlucky and don't find any food drops.- I feel like the humor of this game could be enhanced if the streakers were actually nude, at the moment they all look like they are in swimsuits... perhaps a toggle in the options menu could be added. - You collect a ton of coins, gems, sacks of cash but it doesn't seem like there's a purpose for it. I'd like to see a shop of some sort added to buy upgrades / weapons. ~ You can launch all your followers at once to cause damage. I feel like this would be more enjoyable if you had the option to launch them one at a time.

Posted: March 13, 2016
Early Access Review
								This is the kind of game that Steam needs more of. I've played this game both in single player mode and multiplayer. I can't even get past Guillermo on my own, but it's definitely much more intense and fun when playing multiplayer with friends. Also, I personally prefer playing on a TV with controllers rather than using mouse and keyboard :DSince it's an early access you can expect a few bugs here and there, but I've got a strong feeling that this game will be much more than it is by the time it's officially released ♥

Overall, great game!
